name: HollywoodGin
description: “Hollywood Gin Scorecard” is the ultimate scorecard for the iPhone.  Keeping your scores on multiple variations of the game.  Through parameters you change the ending match score from 100 to 300 (increments of 50) change the dollar values of the boxes and points, Play “Running Hollywood” where when you reach the 3rd game for each player you have the option to start another match.  You have the option to send each completed game as an email to the participants.  You can save a match at anytime to be resumed later.  Each match is archived for viewing later, you also have the ability to remove the last play for a game if you entered a score in error.
